to.sven.androidrccar.host.presentation

Class AbstractHostActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • to.sven.androidrccar.host.presentation.AbstractHostActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHostServiceListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConnectedActivity, UnconnectedActivity, WaitForOtherPhoneActivity

    public abstract class AbstractHostActivity
extends Activity
implements IHostServiceListener
    Base Activity for the hosts activities. Does the binding to the HostService and provides some other generic functionality.
    Author:
    sven

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                    int resultCode,
                    Intent data)
        The started activity is finished. If the user will close the application, the resultCode #RESULT_USER_EXIT is set and this this activity will finish with the same result. noBinding is set to true.
